attributes.additional_details: In the last 10 years how many pubs, clubs and bingo halls have closed within a one mile radius of where you currently live. Bring back CHOICE. Sign this petition.
attributes.background: Since the smoking ban was introduced nearly 10,000 pubs have closed. The #1 reason given by the Licensed Victualers Association for the closures is the smoking ban. Why cannot common sense prevail and non-smokers be trusted to avoid entering clearly-signed smoking venues.
